page.title: 15My house (3)
page.content: My house is a semi-detached house. Our house has inside a sitting room and a dining room. The dining room and the sitting room join up with folding doors (so that you can have one big room or two medium sized rooms). In the sitting room at one end there is a bay window with a window seat. At one end of the dining room there is a patio window looking out on the patio and the garden. The garden in the front is a rockery (and there is a conservatory on from the kitchen). There is a border of plants around the edges. There is a path up the side of the garden. We have one cat and central heating.
